disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

msgId.Wiki: PC Gender is Male: Specify Message-> Menu

voiceId.Wiki: PC Gender is Male: Specify Voice-> Sound

returnPos.Wiki: Relative position of returning conversation-> Conversation

msgId_female.Wiki: PC Gender is Female: Specify Message-> Menu

voiceId_female.Wiki: PC Gender is Female: Specify Voice-> Sound

lipSyncStart.Wiki: Speaker: Lip-sync start time. -1 with no lip-sync

lipSyncTime.Wiki: Speaker: Lip-sync duration. Lip-sync at -1 continues forever

timeout.Wiki: Voice playback timeout period. In case of -1, time-out processing is performed in NPC conversation voice playback timeout time of Common_Game system parameter.

isForceDisp.Wiki: Do you want to force the display of subtitles? Display subtitles even when subtitles are turned off as an option
